alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 1:58PM MDT until March 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the Lower Wind River Basin eastward to northern Natrona County. Casper could get a quick 1 to 2 inches of snow overnight. Occasional northwest wind gusting 15 to 25 mph through late Saturday evening. * WHERE...Wind River Basin and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads could become slick in spots after sunset Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is most likely in Casper between about 8 PM Saturday and 3 AM Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
